author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify debug statements to resolve the issue of failures for phase2 dd4hep. A second PR is under preparation which resolves the issue of failures of Phase2 scenarios with dd4hep

#### PR validation:

Tested using some of the scripts for Phase2 geometry

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gem63A Modify debug statements to resolve the issue of failures for phase2 dd4hep
